attributes.action: make compulsory all shopping trollys to undergo a yearly mot
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe it is dangerous to allow old people and kids to be in control of these potentially lethal machines without regular safty checks for ie: wonky wheels etc.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
